question: Will Ethereum's price have a 10% or more daily change on any day in April 2022?
description:
This is a market on whether Ethereum's ($ETH) price will sustain a daily change of 10% or more, in terms of relative change in their USD prices, on any day within this market timeframe. The resolution source is https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/ethereum/historical_data/usd#panel. 

If the open price of $ETH on any day in April 2022 had a 10% or more absolute percentage difference from its open price the day before, the market will resolve to “Yes.” Otherwise, the market will resolve to “No.”

The following example shows how the absolute percentage difference is calculated. If the open price of $ETH was $3100 on April 10, and the open price of $ETH was $3400 on April 9, the percentage difference would be | ((3100-3400)/(3400)) | * 100 = 8.82%, which would not suffice to resolve the market to “Yes.”

This market's timeframe spans from April 1, 2022 to April 30, 2022 (inclusive). The resolution source will be checked daily at 11 AM ET, checking all the days beforehand. The last check will be May 1, 2022, 11 AM ET. If data is unavailable, another source (e.g. CoinMarketCap) will be used.

question: Will Elden Ring be in the top 5 most played games on Steam on April 25, 2022?
description:
This is a market on whether Elden Ring will be #1-5 on Steam in terms of peak players on April 25, 2022 at 11:59:59 PM ET. Results of this market will be decided by the official Steam player count ("Peak Today") available at https://store.steampowered.com/stats/. 

If Elden Ring is #1-5 or tied for any of those spots, the market will resolve "Yes", and otherwise "No." 

In the event the resolution source is not available on April 25, 2022 at 11:59:59 PM ET, another credible source will be chosen. If no other credible sources are available, the source will be checked every 24 hours until May 2, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, when the market will resolve 50-50.


The games listed at the resolution source will be ranked from highest to lowest based on the amounts in the "Peak Today" column. In the case of ties, the market will use standard competition ranking ("1224" ranking),  where each game's ranking number is 1 plus the number of games ranked above it.

question: NHL: Will the Jets beat the Canadiens by more than 1.5 goals in their April 11 matchup (7 PM ET)?
description:
In the upcoming NHL game, scheduled for April 11:

If the Winnipeg Jets win by over 1.5 goals, the market will resolve to “Yes”.

If the Montreal Canadiens lose by less than 1.5 goals or win, the market will resolve “No.” 

If the game is not completed by April 18, 2022 (11:59:59 PM ET), the market will resolve 50-50.

question: Will the AAA US average national gas price drop below $4.00 by April 25, 2022?
description:
This market asks whether the average US regular gas price according to the American Automotive Association (AAA) will fall below $4.000 by April 25, 2022.

If the average US regular gas price according to AAA is $3.999 or lower (i.e. less than $4.000) on any day between the date of this market's inception April 11 and April 25, 2022 (inclusive) this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be information from the American Automotive Association (AAA), presently found here: https://gasprices.aaa.com/. Specifically, the cell under "Regular" and for the row "Current Avg." will be checked at 8 PM ET daily. If the URL for gas prices as determined by AAA changes, the resolution URL will change. If the resolution source is unavailable on the resolution date, the source will be checked 24 hours later, specifically "Yesterday Avg.", and if still unavailable, another credible source will be used such as https://www.gasbuddy.com/.

question: Will Pope Francis visit Ukraine by May 13, 2022?
description:
Volodymyr Zelensky invited Pope Francis to visit Ukraine. Pope Francis, when later asked if he was considering a visit to Ukraine responded that "Yes, it is on the table."

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Pope Francis visits Ukraine between April 11, 2022 and May 13, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET (inclusive). Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purpose of this market, a "visit" is defined as Pope Francis physically entering the terrestrial or maritime territory of Ukraine. Whether or not Pope Francis enters Ukrainian airspace during the timeframe of this market will have no bearing on a positive resolution.

The primary resolution source for this information will be official information from The Vatican (e.g. https://www.vaticannews.va/en.html); however, other credible reporting may be considered.

question: Will Alexander Lukashenko remain President of Belarus through 2022?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if Alexander Lukashenko remains the President of Belarus without interruption from March 28, 2022, through January 1, 2023, 12:00:00 AM ET (inclusive). Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”.

The resolution source for this market will be the CIA World Factbook page for Belarus, currently available at https://www.cia.gov/the-world-factbook/countries/belarus/#government. It will be checked daily at 12:00 AM ET until the resolution date to see if Alyaksandr LUKASHENKA is still President of Belarus (referred to as Chief of State on the resolution source). 

If the CIA World Factbook page for Belarus is unavailable on the resolution time, it will be checked at 12:00 AM ET every day for the 7 days following resolution time. If the CIA World Factbook is still unavailable at that time, the UN source 
https://www.un.org/dgacm/sites/www.un.org.dgacm/files/Documents_Protocol/hspmfmlist.pdf will be used instead.

question: Will Nancy Pelosi visit Taiwan before June 2022?
description:
Nancy Pelosi, Member of the US House of Representatives from California and present Speaker of the House, announced her intentions in April 2022 to visit Taiwan (Republic of China). Before she could initiate her trip, she tested positive for asymptomatic COVID-19, and her trip was postponed.

Learning of this intended trip, Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi was quoted in response: “If Pelosi, a political leader of the United States, knowingly visits Taiwan, it would be a malicious provocation against China’s sovereignty and gross interference in China’s internal affairs, and would send an extremely dangerous political signal to the outside world... If the United States insists on going its own way, China will surely make a firm response and the US side will bear all the consequences.”

This market asks whether Nancy Pelosi will visit Taiwan between April 8, 2022, and June 1, 2022, 12:00:00 AM ET.

If Nancy Pelosi visits Taiwan between April 8, 2022, and June 1, 2022, 12:00:00 AM ET, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purpose of this market, a "visit" is defined as Nancy Pelosi physically entering the terrestrial or maritime territory of Taiwan. Whether or not Nancy Pelosi enters Taiwanese airspace during the timeframe of this market will have no bearing on a positive resolution.

The primary resolution source for this information will be official information from government of the United States of America, official information from Nancy Pelosi or released by her verified social media accounts (e.g. https://twitter.com/SpeakerPelosi), and official information from Taiwan (e.g. https://www.taiwan.gov.tw/news.php); however, other credible reporting may be considered.

question: Will the USA ambassador be recalled or expelled from Russia before June 1, 2022?
description:
This is a market on whether the United States ambassador to Russia will be withdrawn from Russia by the government of the United States or expelled from Russia by the government of Russia between April 11, 2022 and June 1, 2022, 12:00:00 AM ET. 

If the US ambassador to Russia is recalled from Russia by the government of the US, or expelled from Russia by the government of Russia, between April 11, 2022 and June 1, 2022, 12:00:00 AM ET this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Whether the ambassador resigns or not will have no bearing on the resolution of this market.

The primary resolution source for this market will be the U.S. Embassy and Consulates in Russia (https://ru.usembassy.gov/) as well as official information from the government of the United States including verified social media pages and/or official information from the government of the Russian Federation, however other credible reporting may be used.

For the purposes of resolving this market, an official announcement that an ambassador will be recalled or expelled within the timeframe of the market will be sufficient for a "Yes" resolution.

question: Will Russia's ambassador to any EU country be recalled or expelled before June 1?
description:
This is a market on whether Russia's ambassador to any European Union (EU) member state will be withdrawn from that EU member state by the Russian authorities or expelled from an EU member state by that state's authorities, between April 8, 2022, and June 1, 2022, 12:00:00 AM ET. 

If Russia's ambassador to any EU member state is recalled from that EU member state by the Russian authorities, or expelled from any EU member state by that state's authorities between April 8, 2022, and June 1, 2022, 12:00:00 AM ET, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

This market will resolve according to official info released by the EU member state government, an EU institutional body and/or Russian government, however a consensus of credible media sources will suffice.

For the purposes of resolving this market, an official announcement that an ambassador will be recalled or expelled within the timeframe of the market will be sufficient for a "Yes" resolution.

question: Will an election for the Israeli Knesset occur before August 1, 2022?
description:
Idit Silman, the whip for the ruling coalition in the Knesset, the Israeli Parliament, resigned suddenly in April 2022, breaking the coalition's majority.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if national elections for the 25th Knesset occur before July 31, 2022, 5:00:00 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the government of Israel (https://m.knesset.gov.il/en/mk/pages/elections.aspx), however other credible reporting may be used.

question: Will the 7-day COVID-19 case average in the USA be above 50,000 again by August 1, 2022?
description:
This market will resolve to “Yes” if the 7-day COVID-19 Case average is above 50,000 in the US for any day ranging from April 11, 2022, to August 1, 2022, inclusive, and “No” otherwise. The resolution source for this market is the CDC; https://covid.cdc.gov/covid-data-tracker/#trends_dailytrendscases. 

To account for potential data revisions and/or incompleteness: the market will be checked daily at 8 PM ET to see if any day within the aforementioned range has a 7-day COVID-19 case average above 50,000. These daily checks will occur from April 12, 2022 to August 8, 2022 (inclusive). If an average above 50,000 is detected, it will be checked again 7 days later. If it is still above 50,000 at that point, the market will be resolved. If it is 50,000 or below, then the market will not resolve based on that data point.
